subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Cespedes hit his 35th home run, and helped Juan Uribe produce another important hit as the sizzling Mets picked up their eighth straight victory by edging Miami at Citi Field.
snippet: Cespedes hit his 35th home run, and helped Juan Uribe produce another important hit as the sizzling Mets picked up their eighth straight victory by edging Miami at Citi Field.
